## Load and Test Details

This DQec report is generated from testing completeness in `r CDM` data from `r ORGANIZATION` on `r Sys.Date()`. 

### Table 1. List and Status of Common Data Model (CDM) -- here, `r CDM` -- Tables in this load
The table below provides a list of CDM tables provided (and not provided) in the data load.

The source data this table and the following graphics in this section are being generated from is reports/`r ORGANIZATION`/`r Sys.Date()`/tablelist.csv

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.width= 10}
library(ggplot2)
demog <- read.csv("/Users/mehadi/work/d2health/DQe-c-v2/CDMs/demographic.csv")
cols=colnames(demog)
temp=c()
for (ind in c(1:length(cols))){temp=c(temp,demog[[cols[ind]]])}
demog=data.frame(xval=colnames(demog),yval=temp)

gender=demog[2:3,]
ggplot(data = gender, aes(xval,yval,fill=factor(xval)))
  + geom_bar(stat="identity")
  + xlab("Gender")
  + ylab("Total Count")
  + labs(fill="Gender")

ethnicity=demog[4:5,]
ggplot(data = ethnicity, aes(xval,yval,fill=factor(xval)))
  + geom_bar(stat="identity")
  + xlab("Ethnicity")
  + ylab("Total Count")
  + labs(fill="Ethnicity")
```
